31761115484602.txt.title: Makobe-Grays River Provincial Park Interim Management Statement
31761115484602.txt.summary: This is an Interim Management Statement for Makobe-Grays River Provincial Park in Ontario, outlining guidelines for its management until a comprehensive park plan is prepared. The statement covers land tenure, existing and proposed development, recreation activities, commercial activities, native interests, natural and cultural resources, visitor services, research, and marketing.

31761115465734.txt.title: "Philosophical Basis for Foster Care Compensation: A Review and Recommendations"
31761115465734.txt.summary: The report aims to establish a philosophical basis for compensating foster parents for common child care costs. It reviews existing compensation systems, identifies problems, and proposes a new framework for calculating rates based on cost elements such as food, shelter, and transportation.
